amendment.description: Amendment delays implementation of new Title II formula until the Secretary of Education determines that the implementation will not reduce funding for schools serving high percentages of students in poverty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Moore.
